com.moniuliuma.android.card

Class SmartCardReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moniuliuma.android.card.SmartCardReader

  • public class SmartCardReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to PSAM/SIM (ISO/IEC 7816-4)Card properties and I/O operations on the reader card device.
    APDU CMD State Returned:
    Sw1 sw2 meaning
    90 00Â  successed 62 00 Logical Channel already closed

    62 83 Card Life Cycle State is CARD_LOCKED

    63 10 More data available

    64 00 No specific diagnosis

    65 81 Memory failure

    67 00 Wrong length in Lc

    68 81 Logical channel not supported or is not active

    68 82 Secure messaging not supported

    69 82 Security status not satisfied

    69 85 Conditions of use not satisfied

    6A 80 Incorrect values in command data

    6A 81 Function not supported e.g. card Life Cycle State is CARD_LOCKED

    6A 82 Selected Application / file not found

    6A 84 Not enough memory space

    6A 86 Incorrect P1 P2

    6A 88 Referenced data not found

    6D 00 Invalid instruction

    6E 00 Invalid class

    94 84 Algorithm not supported

      • activate

        public ATR activate(int volt)
        Get ATR (Answer To Reset; as per ISO/IEC 7816-4) from PSAM/SIM card
        Parameters:
        volt - the Card power on Volt. Note.It is reserve param, current no implements.
        Returns:
        response Callback message. ATR.buffer will be an ATR on success.
